title: Logged in but cant submit a ticket.
body: ???????? How does this shit make any sense?

replies.body: Huh, that's kinda odd. Try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to make sure the site recognizes that you're logged in correctly, or possibly try a different browser or private browser tab. If that doesn't work, go ahead and shoot us an email at support@riotgames.com!
